title: Diamond Dazzle Kada Bangles: Add Sparkling Grace to Your Hands
materials: high-clarity diamonds. Features the classic Hyderabadi Polish for enduring luster.
features: Elegant row design featuring dazzling, individually prong-set diamonds. The kadiyam style offers a modern take on the traditional bangle, providing a comfortable yet secure fit. These bangles are meticulously crafted to showcase the brilliance of the diamonds, creating a captivating sparkle. The slender design allows for easy stacking with other bangles for a personalized look.
colors: Classic combination of rich yellow gold and sparkling white diamonds.
occasions: and contemporary celebrations. Also suitable for adding a touch of elegance to everyday wear. Suitable for gifting during Seemantham (సీమంతం) or Voni Function (ఓణీ ఫంక్షన్).
description: A captivating fusion of traditional design and contemporary sparkle. These kadiyam bangles are an investment in timeless elegance. The high-quality diamonds and expertly crafted gold setting ensure lasting beauty and value. The simple yet striking design makes them versatile for any occasion. Crafted by artisans in Hyderabad, known for their gold craftsmanship.
